title: [Client] Kalista's Tips section *still* has a typo in it
body:
In the champion Tips section for Kalista under "Playing Against Kalista" the 3rd tip states,

"If you can break line of sight from Kalista, including through brush, her basic attacks will miss you, fallinging harmlessly to the ground."

Fallinging... 
I reported this bug when she came out and assumed such a trivial thing would've been fixed ages ago. I guess not.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Riot Exgeniar,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=EmeJZAek,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-11-18T22:01:24.118+0000)
>
> Thanks! Fixed it.

Fixed? I just patched live to 5.23 and it's still there. What did you fix?
Can you fix Kallista autoing during suppression?
It's an oversight with her passive since she can't cancel her auto attacks. I'm assuming that Riot's spaghetti code makes it difficult to fix.
